alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, southeastern Leon and southwestern Madison Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near St. Marks to near Perry. Movement was southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Perry, Wakulla, Newport, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Scanlon, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge, Hampton Springs, Liveoak Island, Shady Grove, Goose Pasture, Iddo and Hyde Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison
